ygData.subject: Blued 2 handed Hammer Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if any or all Knew anything about the Blued 2h d Hammer quest ( Ogre Maul +Magic, and Invokes Lighting) .. I know it ivloves Najena, an ogre
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if any or all Knew anything about the Blued 2h'd Hammer
quest ( Ogre Maul +Magic, and Invokes Lighting) .. I know it ivloves
Najena, an ogre maul ... But I can't find any NPC, or MOb that Starts
the quest or Directs me to who could ..

I want My dark Elf Cleric to have one .. To Smite the Enemies of the
Father..8-P

--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
-----------------------------------------------------------
